config.script:
root = self.view.getChild("root")
	
	self.view.custom.toUpdateDelete = False
	root.clearInputs()
	
	payload = {'selectedRow': None}
	system.perspective.sendMessage('mhSetProps',payload)

customMethods.name: showMessage
customMethods.script:
import time
	self.props.text = message
	self.meta.visible = True
	time.sleep(5)
	self.meta.visible = False

customMethods.name: insertDb
customMethods.script:
query = """
INSERT INTO [organization].[ApplicantStatus]
		   ([employerId]
		   ,[participantId]
		   ,[position]
		   ,[appliedDate]
		   ,[interviewedDate]
		   ,[hiredDate]
		   ,[hiredState]
		   ,[appliedComment]
		   ,[interviewedComment]
		   ,[hiredComment]
		   ,[timeCreated]
		   ,[timeRetired])
 VALUES
	   (?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?)
	"""

	emvRow1 = self.getChild("emvRow1")
	
	argNames = [ 
		 'employerId'
		,'participantId'
		,'position'
		,'appliedDate'
		,'interviewedDate'
		,'hiredDate'
		,'hiredState'
		,'appliedComment'
		,'interviewedComment'
		,'hiredComment'
		,'timeCreated'
		,'timeRetired'
	]
	
	args = []
	
	for key in argNames:
		if key == 'employerId':
			args.append(self.view.params.employerId)
		elif key == 'timeCreated':
			args.append(system.date.now())
		elif key == 'timeRetired':
			args.append(None)
		else:
			val = emvRow1.props.params.objDataOut.get(key)
			args.append(val)
	
	applicantStatusId = system.db.runPrepUpdate(query, args, 'RITIOps', getKey=1)
	
	return applicantStatusId

customMethods.name: setComponentsDb
customMethods.script:
emvRow1 = self.getChild("emvRow1")
	query = """
SELECT
	 [id] AS [applicantStatusId]
	,[employerId]
	,[participantId]
	,[position]
	,[appliedDate]
	,[interviewedDate]
	,[hiredDate]
	,[hiredState]
	,[appliedComment]
	,[interviewedComment]
	,[hiredComment]
	,[timeCreated]
	,[timeRetired]
FROM [RITIOps].[organization].[ApplicantStatus]
WHERE [id] = ?
"""

	if isinstance(applicantStatusId, (int, long)) and applicantStatusId >= 0:
		result = system.db.runPrepQuery(query, [applicantStatusId], 'RITIOps')
		colNames = system.dataset.getColumnHeaders(result)
		if result.rowCount == 1:
			emvRow1.props.params.objDataIn = {col:result[0][col] for col in colNames} if result.rowCount == 1 else None
		else:
			emvRow1.props.params.objDataIn = {}

	else:
		emvRow1.props.params.objDataIn = {}

customMethods.name: updateDb
customMethods.script:
query = """
UPDATE [organization].[ApplicantStatus]
SET 
	 [participantId] = ?
	,[position] = ?
	,[appliedDate] = ?
	,[interviewedDate] = ?
	,[hiredDate] = ?
	,[hiredState] = ?
	,[appliedComment] = ?
	,[interviewedComment] = ?
	,[hiredComment] = ?
	,[timeCreated] = ?
WHERE [id] = ?
	"""
	
	emvRow1 = self.getChild("emvRow1")
	
	argNames = [ 
		 'participantId'
		,'position'
		,'appliedDate'
		,'interviewedDate'
		,'hiredDate'
		,'hiredState'
		,'appliedComment'
		,'interviewedComment'
		,'hiredComment'
		,'timeCreated'
		,'id'
	]

	args = []
	
	for key in argNames:
		if key == 'timeCreated':
			args.append(system.date.now())
		elif key == 'id':
			args.append(applicantStatusId)
		else:
			val = emvRow1.props.params.objDataOut.get(key)
			args.append(val)
	
	_applicantStatusId = system.db.runPrepUpdate(query, args, 'RITIOps', getKey=1)

	return _applicantStatusId

customMethods.name: retireDb
customMethods.script:
query = """
UPDATE [organization].[ApplicantStatus]
		SET [timeRetired] = ?
	WHERE [id] = ?
"""

	timeRetired = system.date.now()
	
	args = [timeRetired, applicantStatusId]
	
	_applicantStatusId = system.db.runPrepUpdate(query, args, 'RITIOps', getKey = 1)
	
	return _applicantStatusId

customMethods.name: getValidationMessage
customMethods.script:
emvRow1 = self.getChild("emvRow1")
	
	employerId = self.view.params.employerId
	participantId = emvRow1.props.params.objDataOut.participantId
	position = emvRow1.props.params.objDataOut.position
	hiredDate =  emvRow1.props.params.objDataOut.hiredDate
	hiredState = emvRow1.props.params.objDataOut.hiredState
	
	if employerId is None:
		validationMsg = "Employer is mandatory!"
	elif participantId is None:
		validationMsg = "Participant is mandatory!"
	elif position is None or position.strip() == '':
		validationMsg = "Position is mandatory"	
	elif hiredState == True and  hiredDate is None:
		validationMsg = "Hired date is mandatory because hired state is selected!"	
	else:
		validationMsg = ''
		
	#ystem.perspective.print(('validationMsg: ', validationMsg))
	return validationMsg

customMethods.name: clearInputs
customMethods.script:
emvRow1 = self.getChild("emvRow1")
	emvRow1.props.params.objDataIn = {} if emvRow1.props.params.objDataIn is None else None
